spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The flamewrath is a 7th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 14}, {@hit 6} to hit with spell attacks). It knows the following sorcerer spells:

trait.name: Wreathed in Flame
entries: For the flamewrath, the warm version of the {@spell fire shield} spell has a duration of "until dispelled." The fire shield burns for 10 minutes after the flamewrath dies, consuming its body.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage.
